projects.title: Ethiopian Chamber of Commerce Digital Service (ECDS)
projects.description: A web-based portal enabling ECCSA to offer services digitally to its members and the public, including online registration and service delivery.

projects.title: Industry Information System
projects.description: A data warehousing and visualization platform integrating national and international data sources for the Ministry of Industry.

projects.title: Student Chemistry Lab Simulation
projects.description: A virtual laboratory environment for Grade 11 Chemistry that enhances practical understanding and bridges lab access gaps in schools.

projects.title: IDF ERP
projects.description: A full-stack intelligent ERP solution that brings significant business operations from marketing, lead generation, CRM, inventory, purchases, payroll, and project management to accounting in one platform.
